bug.author: henon
bug.summary: Meta graph is not saved correctly?
bug.description:
Based on the NN XOR example I produced the computation graph from both C# and Python. The meta file differs: Python graph: <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/7eda14dd68648774e211f2077cbc56d324fac0c54a0dfab591e5cb46aeb583f4/68747470733a2f2f66696c65732e6769747465722e696d2f68656e6f6e2f524b56502f696d6167652e706e67></denchmark-link>
C#: <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1c57a27bfcf72256cc6a6af26646fb45cccb811e8dd09c0e5b851186683db58f/68747470733a2f2f66696c65732e6769747465722e696d2f68656e6f6e2f757957492f696d6167652e706e67></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Since the NN XOR example runs through fine, we suspect that the graph export is buggy.
